mapper.insert: insert into fy_user_spread_detail ( create_date, modify_date, tender_user_id, tender_money, tg_money, status_code, tg_user_id, borrow_id, remark ) values ( now(), now(), #{tenderUserId}, #{tenderMoney}, #{tgMoney}, #{statusCode}, #{tgUserId}, #{borrowId}, #{remark} );
mapper.select: select t.*, u.username from fy_user_spread_detail t left join fy_user u on t.tender_user_id = u.id
select count(*) from fy_user_spread_detail t left join fy_user u on t.tender_user_id = u.id
select sum(tg_money) from fy_user_spread_detail t left join fy_user u on t.tender_user_id = u.id
select sum(t.money) from fy_user_award_detail t where t.relate_key = 'user_id' and t.type = 'money_log_friend_name_email_tender_award' and t.user_id = #{tgUserId}
